Upcoming Events

Here are a list of upcoming events and opportunities in the NJ District. Click on the links for more information!

5th Annual Teen Hunger Summit | 11.10.2015

Event Flyer (DOC)

The Community FoodBank of New Jersey and Seton Hall Prep are hosting an event filled with discussions and workshops about poverty, advocacy, and hunger, the focus of our 2015-2016 NJ District Project!

Key Leader | 12.4.2015

Interactive Event Flyer

Event Page

Held over the weekend of December 4-6, 2015 at Camp Cross Roads in Fort Murray, NJ, Key Leader is an event that will help you build on your leadership skills while you meet other students around the state! The weekend is open to anyone in grades 8-12 wanting to come - being a Key Club member is not a requirement. Click the "event page" link above for more information.
